CustomExpression.Name: FUEL FRONT PCT
CustomExpression.Expression: ROUND( [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER QUANTITY] / [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER CAPACITY] ,3) * 100

CustomExpression.Name: FUEL CENTER PCT
CustomExpression.Expression: ROUND( [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER2 QUANTITY]/ [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER2 CAPACITY] ,3) * 100

CustomExpression.Name: FUEL REAR PCT
CustomExpression.Expression: ROUND(( [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER3 QUANTITY] / [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER3 CAPACITY]), 3) * 100

CustomExpression.Name: FUEL QTY LBS
CustomExpression.Expression: 6 * ( [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER QUANTITY] + [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER2 QUANTITY] + [SIMCONNECT:FUEL TANK CENTER3 QUANTITY])
